languages.text: "Иокаста, я исправил{mf||а} последствия вашего небрежения. Но это не значит, что я забыл{mf||а}, кто проморгал эту скверну на борту".
"Sauerback, I have rectified the consequences of your blunder. But that does not mean I have forgotten who was responsible for letting this taint spread on my ship."
languages.original_text: "Иокаста, я исправил{mf||а} последствия вашего небрежения. Но это не значит, что я забыл{mf||а}, кто проморгал эту скверну на борту".

traits.locale_text: "Sauerback, I have rectified the consequences of your blunder. But that does not mean I have forgotten who was responsible for letting this taint spread on my ship."
"Sauerback, I have rectified the consequences of your blunder. But that does not mean I have forgotten who was responsible for letting this taint spread on my ship."
"Sauerback, I have rectified the consequences of your blunder. But that does not mean I have forgotten who was responsible for letting this taint spread on my ship."
"Sauerback, I have rectified the consequences of your blunder. But that does not mean I have forgotten who was responsible for letting this taint spread on my ship."
"Sauerback, I have rectified the consequences of your blunder. But that does not mean I have forgotten who was responsible for letting this taint spread on my ship."
"Sauerback, I have rectified the consequences of your blunder. But that does not mean I have forgotten who was responsible for letting this taint spread on my ship."

languages.text: « Jocasta, vous avez racheté votre faute. Mais cela ne veut pas pour autant dire que j'ai oublié qui est responsable d'avoir laissé cette corruption se répandre sur mon vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, I have rectified the consequences of your blunder. But that does not mean I have forgotten who was responsible for letting this taint spread on my ship."

traits.locale_text: « Jocasta, vous avez racheté votre faute. Mais cela ne veut pas pour autant dire que j'ai oublié qui est responsable d'avoir laissé cette corruption se répandre sur mon vaisseau. »

languages.text: «Sauerback, he rectificado las consecuencias de su fracaso. Eso no significa que haya olvidado quién es responsable por permitir que esta mácula se extienda por mi nave».
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, I have rectified the consequences of your blunder. But that does not mean I have forgotten who was responsible for letting this taint spread on my ship."

traits.locale_text: «Sauerback, he rectificado las consecuencias de su fracaso. Eso no significa que haya olvidado quién es responsable por permitir que esta mácula se extienda por mi nave».

languages.text: “苏尔贝克，我已经纠正了你犯下的愚蠢错误，但我可没忘记是谁任由这样的污秽在我的船上到处蔓延。”
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, I have rectified the consequences of your blunder. But that does not mean I have forgotten who was responsible for letting this taint spread on my ship."

traits.locale_text: “苏尔贝克，我已经纠正了你犯下的愚蠢错误，但我可没忘记是谁任由这样的污秽在我的船上到处蔓延。”

languages.text: 「ザウアーバック、私は君の失態を正した。だが、だからといって、私の船にこの汚れを蔓延させた張本人を忘れたわけではない」
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, I have rectified the consequences of your blunder. But that does not mean I have forgotten who was responsible for letting this taint spread on my ship."

traits.locale_text: 「ザウアーバック、私は君の失態を正した。だが、だからといって、私の船にこの汚れを蔓延させた張本人を忘れたわけではない」

languages.text: "Sauerback, ich habe die Folgen Eures Fehlers berichtigt. Doch das heißt nicht, dass ich vergessen habe, wer dafür verantwortlich war, dass sich dieser Makel auf meinem Schiff ausgebreitet hat."
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, I have rectified the consequences of your blunder. But that does not mean I have forgotten who was responsible for letting this taint spread on my ship."

traits.locale_text: "Sauerback, ich habe die Folgen Eures Fehlers berichtigt. Doch das heißt nicht, dass ich vergessen habe, wer dafür verantwortlich war, dass sich dieser Makel auf meinem Schiff ausgebreitet hat."

languages.text: "Sauerback, yaptığınız hatanın sonucunda yaşananları yoluna koydum. Ancak bu, bu kirliliğin gemime yayılmasına müsaade etme sorumluluğunun kimlerde olduğunu unuttuğum anlamına gelmiyor."
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, I have rectified the consequences of your blunder. But that does not mean I have forgotten who was responsible for letting this taint spread on my ship."
